definitions.definition: In seed-bearing plants, a small opening in the integuments of the ovule through which sperm are able to access the ovum .
The hilum of an ovum at the point of attachment to the ovary ; any opening in the coverings of an ovum by which spermatozoa may find entrance.

main_definition: ( botany ) In seed-bearing plants, a small opening in the integuments of the ovule through which sperm are able to access the ovum .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) The hilum of an ovum at the point of attachment to the ovary ; any opening in the coverings of an ovum by which spermatozoa may find entrance.
